name: I Am Jelly
description:
Hi, I Am Jelly. I'm a hungry little fella and i love midnight snacks. however my parents don't, when they catch me up at night in the kitchen they take me back to my room and take all of my pocket money.

Control jelly through the kitchen collecting as much food as you can while avoiding his parents and getting back to his room safely

The Origin:

I Am Jelly was created during as 12 hour challenge livestream of mine where I had to make a game within the time of that livestream. find out how it turned out by playing the "Jam Version" or play new and improved versions in the latest releases of the game

Known Issues / Bugs

  • Some text doesn't show in menus (this is due to a font that was used. this is being fixed)
